meanings.definition: A teacher or mentor in Japanese martial arts.
meanings.sent1: My sensei taught me how to properly perform a karate kick.
meanings.sent2: The sensei at the dojo has been training students for many years.
meanings.sent3: The sensei showed us how to block punches with ease.
meanings.sent4: Watching the sensei move was like witnessing a graceful dance.
meanings.sent5: I will always remember the wise words of my sensei.

meanings.definition: A respectful title for a skilled or experienced person in a particular field.
meanings.sent1: The sushi sensei is known for making the best rolls in town.
meanings.sent2: Everyone respects the sensei for their knowledge and expertise.
meanings.sent3: The gardening sensei helped me grow the biggest tomatoes in the neighborhood.
meanings.sent4: She was a sensei of fashion, always ahead of the latest trends.
meanings.sent5: The sensei of woodworking crafted beautiful furniture with precision.
